mapper.select: SELECT D.Vchcode, D.[Date], D.VchType, D.Savedate, A.ptypeid, A.Qty AS TQty, A.Price AS TPrice, G.Qty FROM Dlyndx D LEFT JOIN T_GoodsStocksGlide A ON D.Vchcode = A.VchCode LEFT JOIN GoodsStocks G ON A.ptypeid = G.PtypeId WHERE ( D.VchType = '6' OR D.VchType = '9' OR D.VchType = '11' OR D.VchType = '14' OR D.VchType = '16' OR D.VchType = '34' OR D.VchType = '45' ) AND A.GoodsID IS NOT NULL AND G.PtypeId IS NOT NULL AND A.VchCode > #{maxVchCode} ORDER BY D.VchCode DESC
